member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeBuild.NoClean
member.summary: True if you do NOT want to clean the output directory before building. False otherwise.

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.PushGitHub
member.summary: True if you want to push the build package to the GitHub NuGet feed; false otherwise. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.PushAzure
member.summary: True if you want to push the build package to the Azure Artifacts NuGet feed; false otherwise. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.PushNuGet
member.summary: True if you want to push the build package to the NuGet.org feed; false otherwise. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.NoLogo
member.summary: True if you want to push the build package to the NuGet.org feed; false otherwise. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.NoRestore
member.summary: True if you want to restore the build package; false otherwise. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.Interactive
member.summary: True if you want to restore the build package; false otherwise. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.Configuration
member.summary: The configuration to build with. Defaults to "Local"

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.Verbosity
member.summary: The verbosity of the build. Defaults to "minimal"

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.Target
member.summary: The targets to build. Defaults to "Build"

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.Version
member.summary: The version of the built package. Defaults to "0.0.1-Local"

member.name: P:Dgmjr.PowerShell.InvokeDotnet.AssemblyVersion
member.summary: The version of the built assembly file. Defaults to "0.0.1"

member.summary: Provides access to the current assembly information.

member.summary: Provides access to SemVer information for the current assembly.
